title: Integrated E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform supporting physical and digital products. Built with Laravel for backend services, Vue.js for a responsive frontend, and Express.js for API microservices. Containerized using Docker to ensure scalable and consistent deployment. Key features include product management, real-time inventory, secure checkout, payment processing, and user reviews.
